name: Super Popo
description:
Avoid the evil naughty dogs at all cost! 

Controls: WASD or ArrowKeys to Move, Spacebar to Pause

Super Popo is a simple game made by myself using the Godot engine. It is intended to be played in short burst, especially when you have very little time to spend.

Let me know if you find it fun! (or boring!) Any feedback is appreciated. Be sure to share your high scores or any bugs you're running into in the comments down below!

p/s: If you have fun, please consider supporting me!
